title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS What gardeners need to do before the freeze.  Pantone color of the year is one of my least fave colors.  I would like to bring this instant pot risotto back into my life.  This upside-down pecan cake could rival my mom’s coffee cake.  Taco Bell drive thru with a photobooth?? Can you reuse frying oil?  Buildings repurposed in cool ways!  How Fight Club taught us to distrust flying.  A hair-freezing contest sounds fun.  Brain Rot is the word of the year.  What’s a reverse gift list? Apparently owning a home makes you live longer. 20 Maps that changed the world.  Amazing northern lights photos!  The ultimate Christmas trivia list.  Time travel-Musicians backstage 1970s.  Why are potato chip bags so shiny on the inside? Holiday dresses: one/two/three/four Weekend baking: tahini cookies / lime macaroons Here are some homemade holiday gift ideas!      I posted my Favorite Things for 2024– Did you see? Did you know that I have a Substack and a YouTube channel? Now you do! Give them both a follow if you like the handwriting aspect of what I do here! O  You can see more of my Currently Workbook pages for November on The Handwriting Club.  Help me Help YOU! You help me pay for my health insurance while you’re working on a planner!  Use my affiliate link to get a free month of Skillshare premium!  Want extra discounts and cashback on online purchases? I use Rakuten religiously!  The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!

html:
I LOVE LISTS

  1. What gardeners need to do before the freeze. 
  2. Pantone color of the year is one of my least fave colors. 
  3. I would like to bring this instant pot risotto back into my life. 
  4. This upside-down pecan cake could rival my mom’s coffee cake. 
  5. Taco Bell drive thru with a photobooth??
  6. Can you reuse frying oil? 
  7. Buildings repurposed in cool ways! 
  8. How Fight Club taught us to distrust flying. 
  9. A hair-freezing contest sounds fun. 
  10. Brain Rot is the word of the year. 
  11. What’s a reverse gift list?
  12. Apparently owning a home makes you live longer.
  13. 20 Maps that changed the world. 
  14. Amazing northern lights photos! 
  15. The ultimate Christmas trivia list. 
  16. Time travel-Musicians backstage 1970s. 
  17. Why are potato chip bags so shiny on the inside?
  18. Holiday dresses: one/two/three/four
  19. Weekend baking: tahini cookies / lime macaroons
  20. Here are some homemade holiday gift ideas! 

I posted my Favorite Things for 2024– Did you see?

Did you know that I have a Substack and a YouTube channel? Now you do! Give them both a follow if you like the handwriting aspect of what I do here!
